title: Ella Eyre nails the sports luxe look in leopard print top and baggy shorts
text:
She is a vocal powerhouse who always catches the eye at red-carpet events.

And Ella Eyre looked incredible as she arrived at the Notion Magazine celebrates 85 issues and 15 years of music event in London on Friday.

The singer, 25, nailed the sports luxe look in a black and teal leopard print lycra top which hugged her slender frame.

Style: Ella Eyre looked incredible as she arrived at the Notion Magazine celebrates 85 issues and 15 years of music event in London on Friday

She drew the eye to her lean legs in a pair of black shiny shorts with a striking white logo, finishing the ensemble with trainers.

Her caramel hued brunette tresses were styled in her signature half updo, with the star adding sparkle with gold hoop earrings.

The star later put on a showstopping performance on-stage at the glitzy event.

Ella recently promoted her new single Mama, admitting in a new interview this week with the Evening Standard that it has taken her time to overcome the writer's block she suffered following the death of her father in 2017.

Chic: The singer, 25, nailed the sports luxe look in a black and teal leopard print lycra top which hugged her slender frame

Work it: She drew the eye to her lean legs in a pair of black shiny shorts with a striking white logo, finishing the ensemble with trainers

Ella, who grew up in London, travelled to Jamaica where her father lived all his life explaining that the trip helped her deal with her grief.

'My dad died and it sort of threw me a little bit and I took a step back,' she said. 'I went from being really unconfident and anxious to going to Jamaica and dealing with some demons and I came back feeling like a whole new person.

'The only project I'm really focused on now is my solo album and getting that going again. There's more music planned … there's a lot going on behind the scenes.'

Vocal prowess; The star oozed confidence as she took to the stage at the event

Strut: The star looked stunning as she took to the stage at the glamorous event

In April, Ella spoke exclusively to MailOnline about the secrets to her confidence, citing her mother as her biggest inspiration.

Speaking at the The Ivy Spinningfields, Manchester Super Party, she said: 'My confidence comes from my mum.'

'She has balls of steel and instilled that in me from a young age!'
description: Ella Eyre looked incredible as she arrived at the Notion Magazine celebrates 85 issues and 15 years of music event in London on Friday.
